availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas F. Cundiff (Daviess County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac Cundiff and Fannie Fortune Cundiff. Married to Margaret A. Stone Cundiff in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, on July 7, 1842. Father of William H. Cundiff, James B. Cundiff, Martha J. Cundiff, Rebecca Cundiff, Melvina Cundiff, Cicero Cundiff, Thomas Cundiff, and Robert Cundiff. Farmer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Daviess County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 1, p. 396B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 854.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Masonville, p. 213A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County Marriages, Film 000557316, p. 19.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Daviess County Administrators Bonds, 1866-1882, p. 445.
History of Daviess County, Kentucky (Chicago: Inter-State Publishing Co., 1883), 730.
